page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN SANDBACH
page.content: WITHIN THE AREA ARE TWO SAND QUARRYING INDUSTRIES ON EITHER SIDE OF THE A534. ON ONE SIDE OF THE ROAD 37 FULL TIME MEN EXCAVATE VARIOUS GRADES OF SILICA SAND FOR NATIONWIDE{DISTRIBUTION} WHILST ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROAD 70 PEOPLE ARE{EMPLOYED}AT THE AREA OFFICE OF AN INTERNATIONAL FIRM OF SAND EXCAVATORS PROVIDING SAND MAINLY FOR THE GLASS AND FOUNDRY{INDUSTRY. A MOTEL AND A{HOTEL}PROVIDE RESTAURANT,CONFERENCE AND ACCOMODATION SEVICES FOR THE LOCALITY. BOTH ARE SITUATED CLOSE TO THE M.6.THE MOTEL EMPLOYS 60 PEOPLE WHILST THE HOTEL EMPLOYS 22.
